## Frustum.getCorner() method

Get the point of a given corner.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCorner(pos: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pos | number | The corner index. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The point of given corner

## Remarks

The possible values of argument 'pos' are: <ul> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_LEFT\_TOP\_NEAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_left_top_near.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_LEFT\_TOP\_FAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_left_top_far.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_RIGHT\_BOTTOM\_FAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_right_bottom_far.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_RIGHT\_BOTTOM\_NEAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_right_bottom_near.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_LEFT\_BOTTOM\_NEAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_left_bottom_near.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_LEFT\_BOTTOM\_FAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_left_bottom_far.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_RIGHT\_BOTTOM\_FAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_right_bottom_far.md)</li> <li>[Frustum.CORNER\_RIGHT\_BOTTOM\_NEAR](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.corner_right_bottom_near.md)</li> </ul>
